normalized: i had ordered hans to examine each and every action the two women had taken yesterday.
had he come to me unannounced, in order to satisfy that curiosity of mine?
what could it be?
whatever it was, it seemed like the actions of the mother-daughter witch-duo were of extreme significance.
i was convinced of it――
however, hans’s report was contrary to that.

name: hans
normalized: i examined both of their behaviour, their conversations, the stuff they ingested and the contents of the faeces.
i even examined their reactions during their public relations mission, but i didn’t find anything suspicious whatsoever.

name: bohgan
normalized: our soldiers must have gotten wind of this investigation.

name: hans
normalized: yes, they have.
however, the results prove that there haven’t been any significant changes in the actions of the women.

name: bohgan
normalized: so, there was nothing significant, huh…?
looks like i had been worrying about them needlessly.

name: hans
normalized: however…

name: bohgan
normalized: what?

name: hans
normalized: nothing.
it isn’t a big deal.
after giving his preliminary report, hans continued.

name: hans
normalized: i conducted a surprise search of the belongings of all our officers in the unlikely event of spies being on our ship.

name: bohgan
normalized: and something came up in the search?

name: hans
normalized: not only are all our crew-members trustworthy, but they are also on this ship with their sole focus being the brainwashing process.
however, we can’t rule out the possibility that some of them have defected to the mother-daughter witch-duo and become spies.

name: bohgan
normalized: hmm… could be.
however, if some of our soldiers have indeed become spies for these witches, they would have known about their brainwashing by now and those soldiers would be dead.

name: hans
normalized: i believe so as well… also, there is one more thing which has been bothering me…

name: bohgan
normalized: what is it?

name: hans
normalized: sergeants of our security personnel were in possession of a lot of money.

name: bohgan
normalized: money?

name: hans
normalized: and, this was a mission which didn’t have a need for money whatsoever, then why would they be in possession of so much of it…?
hans was floundering while trying find the correlation.
however, i clicked my fingers immediately.

name: bohgan
normalized: that’s it!

name: hans
normalized: huh?
come again?

name: bohgan
normalized: they acquired that money from those witches.
hans became slightly distressed after hearing my response.

name: hans
normalized: d-does that mean that our sergeants have betrayed us?

name: bohgan
normalized: i don’t think that that was their intention.
i shook my head.

name: bohgan
normalized: i fear that the sergeants may have thought that “it is no big deal” when those witches asked them certain things in exchange for money.

name: bohgan
normalized: and they might have told the witches those “certain things” and accepted the money thinking “it is fine”.

name: hans
normalized: i see.
i will detain those sergeants immediately and interrogate them to find out what it is that they divulged to those witches!

name: bohgan
normalized: we might get a clue as to what those witches are up to from the information that they had asked of them.

name: hans
normalized: yes!
hans rushed out of the operations room.

name: bohgan
normalized: kukukuku… you should have given the sergeants only expense money at most.
or was that huge amount mere pocket-change for you?

name: bohgan
normalized: i have managed to peel off your masks and see through you, you fools!
